refnamediv.refpurpose: Include lable in hyperlinked titles in TOC?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If the value of autotoc.label.in.hyperlink is non-zero, labels are included in hyperlinked titles in the TOC. If it is instead zero, labels are still displayed prior to the hyperlinked titles, but are not hyperlinked along with the titles.
